changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dataset (name, active, needs_approval) SELECT dac.name, 't', 'f' FROM dac

changeSet.author: rfricke
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO datasetproperty (datasetid, propertykey, propertyvalue, createdate) SELECT datasetid, keyid, name as propertyvalue, current_timestamp FROM dataset INNER JOIN dictionary on key = 'Dataset Name'

changeSet.author: rfricke
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO consents(consent_id, requires_manual_review, use_restriction, active, name, data_use, dac_id) SELECT concat('9e5a4135-e635-41a4-8663-042667ef4a7f', dataset.datasetid), 'f', '{ "type": "everything" }', 't', concat('Test consent ', dataset.datasetid), '{"hmbResearch":true,"populationOriginsAncestry":true,"genomicPhenotypicData":"Yes"}', dataset.datasetid FROM dataset

changeSet.author: rfricke
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO consent_associations (consent_id, association_type, dataset_id) SELECT consent_id, 'Sample', dac_id FROM consents
